Package org.bukkit.inventory.meta

Interface ColorableArmorMeta

All Superinterfaces:
ArmorMeta, Cloneable, ConfigurationSerializable, ItemMeta, LeatherArmorMeta, PersistentDataHolder, PersistentDataViewHolder
public interface ColorableArmorMeta extends ArmorMeta, LeatherArmorMeta
Represents armor that an entity can equip and can also be colored.
